Posts.Content: pratibha wrote: Hi everybody, I might have to go in for a mastectomy this month after an unsuccessful lumpectomy. Has anyone had any experience with dr. neil woolfson at credit valley hospital? Want to make sure that I get a good surgeon this time round but cannot wait for too long for appointments with other surgeons! Thanks for your help! Log in to post a reply
